scripts.validate-quick: test -d public && test -f public/index.html && test -d public/assets && echo '✅ Public directory exists' || (echo '❌ Public directory missing - running build' && npm run build-test)
scripts.build-test: cd ../web && npm install && npm run build && cd ../api && rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp -r ../web/dist/* public/ && echo '✅ Build test successful'
